TopicSection.Content:
You can group data as a month/day view calendar using Calendar Layout Grouping Strategy. Each data item in calendar layout grouping strategy is treated as an event item of a day.

You can customize the style of the calendar by setting a style or by changing group item layout using row template.

The above image is an example of calendar layout grouping strategy.

Sample Code

In order to use calendar group strategy, you need to add the following two file references after "spreadgrid.js" script to your HTML page:

Javascript JS <link rel ="stylesheet" href=".temp/calendarLayout.css">
<script src=".temp/plugins/calendarLayoutEngineStrategy.js"></script>
